category: General Assembly of Delegates and Board of Directors Regulations/Article 15 (Consent, Reopening or Reopening)
contents: Article 15 (Consent, reconsideration or resumption) ① Once the discussion has progressed to a certain extent, the delegates must submit a motion on whether to pass the agenda submitted to the meeting as originally proposed. ② When a motion is established, a delegate may submit a motion to amend the content of the motion, and when a motion is established, another delegate may submit another motion to revise the motion in the order of the motion to reopen or reopen the motion. ③ Any agreement or disagreement is established only when two or more people agree. The same applies to the following amendment motion for resumption.
